thread.title: Erdogan's market fight sees Turkish lira tumble

title: Erdogan's market fight sees Turkish lira tumble
text:
Erdogan's market fight sees Turkish lira tumble Tuesday, May 22, 2018 - 01:48
Turkey's lira extended its relentless tumble, sliding more than 2 percent against the dollar on concerns about President Tayyip Erdogan's influence over monetary policy and the central bank's inability to rein in double-digit inflation.
Turkey's lira extended its relentless tumble, sliding more than 2 percent against the dollar on concerns about President Tayyip Erdogan's influence over monetary policy and the central bank's inability to rein in double-digit inflation. //reut.rs/2ICyzf1
